content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Farhad Abbasi. I would like to negotiate the price for my apartment. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Considering the excellent location of your apartment and its modern features, I propose starting the negotiation with a rental price of 750 Euros per month. However, I am open to discussing potential reductions if the conditions suit me well.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am not satisfied with your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Given my initial standpoint, I am willing to lower my proposal to 800 Euros monthly, but I must emphasize that this price already reflects a considerable reduction from the original value.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I am still not satisfied with your offer. I am looking for a higher price. Please make another offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: It seems our perspectives differ greatly. However, in an effort to reach an agreement, I adjust my offer to 825 Euros per month while maintaining that this price is fair considering the apartment's location and amenities.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I agree to the price of 900 Euros per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is far below my expectation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
